physical_appearance:This is a container of ointment. It is green with white inscriptions
 and circular in shape. The brand \u0027Star \u0026 Ring Brand\u0027 is inscribed on the cover. There is a picture of a star with a ring attached to it in the front. The cover is largely stained and rusty.
subject_terms_1:Peranakan sewing tools tailors lubricant
subject_terms_2:Ointments Peranakan (Asian people) Sewing Equipment and supplies Tailors Clothing trade Lubrication and lubricants
subject_terms_3:Vanishing trade
sgcool_label_text:This container of ointment was likely used to lubricate the embroiderer’s hands or the needle to facilitate the task of embroidery. It was of the Star \u0026 Ring Brand and sold by Chee Min Chinese Medical Hall. The original owner of these items made a living fashioning beaded slippers and dresses
 working from home as she did not have a shop.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a container of ointment. It is green with white inscriptions, and circular in shape. The brand 'Star & Ring Brand' is inscribed on the cover. There is a picture of a star with a ring attached to it in the front. The cover is largely stained and rusty.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Ointments Peranakan (Asian people) Sewing Equipment and supplies Tailors Clothing trade Lubrication and lubricants
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This container of ointment was likely used to lubricate the embroiderer’s hands or the needle to facilitate the task of embroidery. It was of the Star & Ring Brand and sold by Chee Min Chinese Medical Hall. The original owner of these items made a living fashioning beaded slippers and dresses, working from home as she did not have a shop.
